```{r}
dfW <- read_csv("../Data/exp2_sim_data.csv")
```

visualize the main data.

```{r}

ggplot(dfW, aes(x = probability, y = w_prob,
                color = as_factor(gamma_true))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1) +
  labs(color = "gamma value", x = "p", y = "w(p)") +
  xlim(0, 1) +
  ylim(0, 1) 

```

visualize the toy model
